Text: List of accolades received by WALL-E:  Walt Disney Pictures released it in the United States and Canada on June 27, 2008, grossing $23.1 million on its opening day, and $63 million during its opening weekend in 3,992 theaters, ranking number 1 at the box office.
Triplets:<Walt Disney Pictures

--------------------
Text: List of accolades received by WALL-E:  It eventually grossed $223 million domestically and $533 million worldwide.
Triplets:<WALL-E
3:
--------------------
Text: List of accolades received by WALL-E:  "WALL-E" was well received, with an approval rating of 96% on the review aggregator Rotten Tomatoes.
